issue.title: [C++] Add a basic (single RecordBatch) implementation of Dataset
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6138](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6138). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The simplest case for a Dataset is one which views a single RecordBatch. This would be a usefully trivial test implementation and could yield some hints about API ergonomics
